$description: D&D 5e conditions (SRD 5.2). Status effects that apply to creatures.

data.name: Blinded
data.description: Can't see, fail check needing sight. Attacks vs you Adv, your attacks Dis.

data.name: Charmed
data.description: Can't attack charmer. Charmer has Adv on social checks.

data.name: Deafened
data.description: Can't hear, fail checks needing hearing.

data.name: Frightened
data.description: Dis on checks/attacks while source in sight. Can't move closer.

data.name: Invisible
data.description: Heavily obscured. Attackers Dis, your attacks Adv.

data.name: Paralyzed
data.description: Incapacitated. Can't move/speak. Fail Str/Dex saves. Attacks vs you Adv + Auto-crit if within 5ft.

data.name: Petrified
data.description: Transformed to stone. Incapacitated. Wt x10. Res to all damage.

data.name: Poisoned
data.description: Dis on attacks and ability checks.

data.name: Prone
data.description: Crawl only. Dis on attacks. Attacks vs you Adv (within 5ft) or Dis (outside).

data.name: Restrained
data.description: Speed 0. Dis on Dex saves. Attackers Adv, your attacks Dis.

data.name: Stunned
data.description: Incapacitated. Can't move/speak. Fail Str/Dex saves. Attacks vs you Adv.

data.name: Unconscious
data.description: Incapacitated. Drop everything. Fail Str/Dex saves. Attacks vs you Adv + Auto-crit.
